title: Create prompty viewer/editor
description: Render .prompty files with YAML frontmatter extraction, fillable {{variable}} fields.
notes:
## prepared.prompt

Create the Prompty viewer/editor section for rendering .prompty files with YAML frontmatter and fillable {{variable}} fields.

**Context:** This ports the PromptyViewer from TabzChrome to markdown-themes. The viewer displays .prompty files (markdown with YAML frontmatter) and makes {{variable}} placeholders interactive - users can click them to fill in values. This enables a "prompt notebook" workflow for crafting and testing prompts.

**Reference implementation:**
- Main viewer: `/home/marci/projects/TabzChrome/extension/dashboard/components/files/PromptyViewer.tsx` (430 lines)
- Utils: `/home/marci/projects/TabzChrome/extension/dashboard/utils/promptyUtils.ts`
- Inline field editor: `/home/marci/projects/TabzChrome/extension/dashboard/components/files/InlineField.tsx` (259 lines)

**Key patterns to port:**
- YAML frontmatter regex: `/^---\r?\n([\s\S]*?)\r?\n---\r?\n([\s\S]*)$/`
- Variable regex: `/\{\{([^:}]+)(?::([^}]+))?\}\}/g`
- Supports `{{name}}`, `{{name:hint}}`, and `{{name:opt1|opt2|opt3}}` for dropdowns

**Files to create:**
1. `src/components/PromptNotebook.tsx` - Main section component (container, state management)
2. `src/components/PromptyViewer.tsx` - Port from TabzChrome, displays frontmatter + fillable content
3. `src/utils/promptyUtils.ts` - Parsing functions: extractFrontmatter(), parseVariables(), etc.
4. `src/components/InlineField.tsx` - Clickable {{variable}} field with edit mode

**UX requirements:**
- Tab/Shift+Tab navigation between fields
- Enter to save field value, Escape to cancel
- Progress indicator showing "X/Y fields filled"
- Visual distinction between filled and unfilled variables
- Display YAML frontmatter metadata (name, description, model, etc.)

**Acceptance criteria:**
- [ ] Loads .prompty content and extracts YAML frontmatter
- [ ] Renders markdown body with syntax highlighting
- [ ] {{variable}} placeholders are clickable and editable inline
- [ ] Dropdown support for `{{var:opt1|opt2}}` syntax
- [ ] Progress shows filled vs total variables
- [ ] Tab navigation works between fields
- [ ] Frontmatter displayed in collapsible header

When done, commit with descriptive message and run `bd close markdown-themes-05x`.
close_reason: Created Prompty viewer with YAML frontmatter, inline {{variable}} fields, Tab navigation, and dropdown support

title: Add tab management system
description: Preview/pin pattern like VS Code. Single-click = preview (italic, replaced by next), double-click = pin.
notes:
## prepared.prompt

Add a tab management system to markdown-themes with VS Code-style preview/pin behavior.

**Context:** The app currently shows a single file in MarkdownViewer.tsx. Users need to work with multiple files simultaneously. The TabzChrome Files.tsx component has a working implementation of this pattern to reference.

**Files to create:**
- src/components/TabBar.tsx - Tab strip component with preview/pin visual states
- src/hooks/useTabManager.ts - Tab state management hook

**Files to modify:**
- src/App.tsx - Integrate TabBar above the viewer area
- src/store/useAppStore.ts - Add tabs state (if needed for persistence)

**Implementation details:**
1. useTabManager.ts hook:
   - Track tabs array: { id, path, isPreview, isPinned }
   - openTab(path, preview: boolean) - opens file, preview=true for single-click
   - pinTab(id) - converts preview to pinned
   - closeTab(id) - removes tab
   - Preview tabs: only one at a time, replaced by next preview

2. TabBar.tsx component:
   - Render horizontal tab strip
   - Preview tabs: italic text, no close button until hover
   - Pinned tabs: normal text, always show close button
   - Active tab: highlighted background
   - Double-click handler to pin

3. App.tsx integration:
   - Add TabBar between Sidebar and viewer area
   - Pass current file from active tab to viewer

**Acceptance criteria:**
- [ ] Single-click opens file as preview (italic tab)
- [ ] Double-click or edit pins the tab
- [ ] Opening new preview replaces existing preview
- [ ] Pinned tabs persist until explicitly closed
- [ ] Tab close button works
- [ ] Active tab is visually highlighted

When complete, commit changes and run `bd close markdown-themes-2lc`.
